question: The main function of General Assembly of UNO is:
option1: It discusses & makes recommendations on any subject mentioned in the UN charter except those with which the Security Council may be dealing with
option2: It is responsible for international peace and security
option3: It is responsible for admission of new member, suspension and for expulsion of old member
answer: It discusses & makes recommendations on any subject mentioned in the UN charter except those with which the Security Council may be dealing with
